Description of this week show; nicked from Setanta website:

Join James Richardson, Steve Claridge and Jason McAteer for the Friday Football Show ? 6pm on Friday on Setanta Sports 2.

This week we reflect on those Champions League semis, and the duel at the top of the Premier League.

And we also focus on the bottom ? Bolton v Sunderland is live on Setanta Sports 1 on Saturday from 4pm.

We hear from Gary Megson and Kevin Davies on Bolton?s recent revival and get their thoughts on their bid to beat the drop. Former Trotters chief Sam Allardyce is also a guest.

And we speak to two Sunderland players who have been involved in contrasting relegation scraps in recent years ? Kieran Richardson formerly of West Brom, and ex-Charlton midfielder Andy Reid.

We also speak to former Fulham manager Lawrie Sanchez ahead of The Cottagers? huge game against bottom three rivals Birmingham, and we?re in Manchester to hear of what the fans think of the expected sacking of Sven Goran Eriksson.

All that and much more from 6pm on Friday on Setanta Sports 2.
